channel.title: Crystal Bow melees? And how to change the teleports around
channel.description: Well the first one pretty much explains it but I'm trying to edit the tele to KBD. I also want to add the thing where you click the teleport and 5 orbs come up and you can click one of them to tele somewhere different. o.O Any help?

search for longbow / a long bow’s id.

item.title: Crystal Bow melees? And how to change the teleports around
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

frostscapeserver:

Unfortunately, I’m not a good coder, and I suck at knowing where to declare stuff. Any change you can paste the code and where I should put it? :0

use public?
well anyways, search for an existing bow somewhere in client.java you’ll find it there then just add the crystal bow. for the teleports, you need the interface ID. try 374. that worked for me but it might now for you because maybe your client doesn’t has the interface /it’s editted. anyways, after you find the interface ID you add it in clickingMost.java. i’d help you more but i haven’t been on a computer for about 2 months and i kind of forgot… anyways i’d download an existing source and try to learn how coding works from there if i were you.

Read full topic
